attribute.name: event
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with 'eventexpr'. If the type is http://www.w3.org/TR/scxml/#SCXMLEventProcessor, either this attribute or 'eventexpr' must be present.
attribute.description: A string indicating the name of message being generated. See for details on the data type.

attribute.name: eventexpr
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with 'event'. If the type is http://www.w3.org/TR/scxml/#SCXMLEventProcessor, either this attribute or 'event' must be present.
attribute.description: A dynamic alternative to 'event'. If this attribute is present, the SCXML Processor must evaluate it when the parent <send> element is evaluated and treat the result as if it had been entered as the value of 'event'.

attribute.name: target
attribute.description: The unique identifier of the message target that the platform should send the event to. See for details.

attribute.name: targetexpr
attribute.validValues: An expression evaluating to a valid target URI
attribute.description: A dynamic alternative to 'target'. If this attribute is present, the SCXML Processor must evaluate it when the parent <send> element is evaluated and treat the result as if it had been entered as the value of 'target'.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The URI that identifies the transport mechanism for the message. See for details.

attribute.name: typeexpr
attribute.description: A dynamic alternative to 'type'. If this attribute is present, the SCXML Processor must evaluate it when the parent <send> element is evaluated and treat the result as if it had been entered as the value of 'type'.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: A string literal to be used as the identifier for this instance of <send>. See for details.

attribute.name: idlocation
attribute.description: Any location expression evaluating to a data model location in which a system-generated id can be stored. See below for details.

attribute.name: delay
attribute.validValues: A time designation as defined in CSS2 format
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with 'delayexpr' or when the attribute 'target' has the value "_internal".
attribute.description: Indicates how long the processor should wait before dispatching the message. See for details on the data type.

attribute.name: delayexpr
attribute.validValues: A value expression which returns a time designation as defined in CSS2 format
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with 'delay' or when the attribute 'target' has the value "_internal".
attribute.description: A dynamic alternative to 'delay'. If this attribute is present, the SCXML Processor must evaluate it when the parent <send> element is evaluated and treat the result as if it had been entered as the value of 'delay'.

attribute.name: namelist
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not be specified in conjunction with <content> element.
attribute.description: A space-separated list of one or more data model locations to be included as attribute/value pairs with the message. (The name of the location is the attribute and the value stored at the location is the value.) See for details.
